condoning.question: Did I condone a funeral where human remains were not buried?
condoning.description: Failing to advocate for proper burial of human remains is considered sinful as the Church teaches that the body is sacred and deserves reverent burial, with scattering or keeping remains being contrary to the dignity of the human body and resurrection belief.

condoning.question: Did I fail to advise another Catholic against marrying outside the Church?

envy.question: Have I wished for others' blessings to be taken away, feeling a pang of discontent when they prosper?
envy.description: Envy leads us to have discontent for another's possessions so we won't feel the pain of comparison or perceived lack in our own lives.

incontinence.question: Did I lack self-control and use inappropriate language when speaking with others in social settings?
incontinence.description: This sin of incontinence shows a lack of self-restraint and violates the dignity of others.

extracted_data_phrases: in an unbecoming or derogatory manner
incontinence.question: Did I lack self-control and speak to others in an unbecoming or derogatory manner, using language that is unfit for their dignity?
incontinence.description: This sin of incontinence shows a lack of self-restraint and violates the dignity of others.

extracted_data_phrases: in my family and social circle
incontinence.question: Did I lack self-control when speaking to others, particularly those in my family and social circle, and did I use language that was unbecoming or hurtful?
incontinence.description: This sin of incontinence shows a lack of self-restraint and violates the dignity of others.

extracted_data_phrases: in eating or drinking while enjoying leisure activities or social gatherings beyond what is reasonable
gluttony.question: Did I overindulge in eating or drinking while enjoying leisure activities or social gatherings beyond what is reasonable?
gluttony.description: This sin of gluttony demonstrates an inordinate attachment to worldly pleasures and rejects the call to temperance.

extracted_data_phrases: in eating or drinking beyond what 's reasonable
with family , such as during holidays or special occasions
such as during holidays or special occasions
gluttony.question: Did you overindulge in eating or drinking beyond what's reasonable, especially when spending time with family, such as during holidays or special occasions?
gluttony.description: This sin of gluttony demonstrates an inordinate attachment to worldly pleasures and rejects the call to temperance.

gossip.question: Have I taken pleasure in sharing others' private affairs, even if what was shared was true?
gossip.description: Gossip violates human dignity and charity by harming others' reputations for our own entertainment or pride.

extracted_data_phrases: for my own entertainment or satisfaction
gossip.question: Have I shared information about others' private affairs, even if it was true, for my own entertainment or satisfaction?
gossip.description: Gossip violates human dignity and charity by harming others' reputations for our own entertainment or pride.

extracted_data_phrases: for doing something that could have been avoided
impiety.question: Did I use Sunday, a holy day of rest, for doing something that could have been avoided?
impiety.description: It's irreverent to work on a Sunday as it's a holy day of rest, worship, and a day of protest against the servitude of work and the worship of money (CCC).

violence.question: Have you neglected to rest on Sundays, even when it could be avoided without harming others?
violence.description: It's irreverent to work on a Sunday as it's a holy day of rest, worship, and a day of protest against the servitude of work and the worship of money (CCC).

extracted_data_phrases: especially in interactions with family members and close friends
with family members and close friends
anger.question: Have I nursed anger or held onto feelings of rage rather than seeking reconciliation through my relationships, especially in interactions with family members and close friends?
anger.description: Uncontrolled anger corrupts our own heart, damages our relationship with both God and neighbor.
